quest.name: Grounds for Improvement
journal:
Stigma-4 is seeking an upgrade to the Last Dregs.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested materials to the food processing unit.
objectives: Mine [Error] from the Elysian fields.Deliver [Error] to the food processing unit.Gather [Error] from the Elysian fields.Catch [Error] from the Elysian fields.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: According to verbal testimony of the malodorous manager, “delicious” and “unique” coffee is a vital component of any café. Although objective analysis of such inherently subjective categories proves difficult, current stores of coffee have been classified as insufficient.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Upgrading establishment coffee is predicted to result in clear strategic benefits. Your task is to procure necessary ingredients to achieve this goal.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Mine rock salt from the Elysian fields. When your task is complete, deliver the materials to the food processing unit in the Last Dregs.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Gather nectar from the Elysian fields. When your task is complete, deliver the materials to the food processing unit in the Last Dregs.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Procure seaweed from the Elysian fields. When your task is complete, deliver the materials to the food processing unit in the Last Dregs. Gold salmon roe is recommended as bait for quickest completion of task.

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04611
dialogue.text: <whirr> Allied life-form Forename detected. This is in regards to the coffee upgrade, yes? Scanning for requested materials... Requested materials could not be detected. Please try again.

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04611
dialogue.text: <whirr> Allied life-form Forename detected. This is in regards to the coffee upgrade, yes? Scanning for requested materials... Requested materials detected. Please place them carefully in this unit's receptacle.

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04611
dialogue.text: <whirr> Receipt of materials confirmed. This unit thanks you for your efforts. Return to Stigma-4 for your recompense.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Receptacle unit report received. Your cooperation is appreciated.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: According to subjective analysis by bewhiskered manager, rock salt mitigates the natural bitterness of coffee, resulting in a mild flavor that is acceptable to a wide range of palates.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: According to subjective analysis by bewhiskered manager, nectar-derived compounds lend revitalizing sweetness to coffee.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: According to subjective analysis by bewhiskered manager, salt extracted from dried seaweed mitigates the natural bitterness of coffee, resulting in a mild flavor that is widely acceptable to a range of palates.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Projections indicate that coffee upgrades will result in increased patronage and an overall improvement of morale among café occupants. Whether this upward trajectory shall continue depends on the further assistance of helpful organisms such as yourself.
